name: gedcomx-js
description: JavaScript object model for GEDCOM X

scripts.test: _mocha && npm run test:core && npm run test:rs && npm run test:records
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --report lcovonly node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/*.js node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/core/*.js node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/rs/*.js node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/records/*.js && codecov
